title: Morgana ability icon problems
body: If you go to Champions in your summoner profile and select {{champion:25}}, you can see that her ability and passive icons have not been updated. I am just wondering why this is the case, whether or not it is a mistake that RIOT forgot or if it is what was planned which I doubt. Just wondering as I wish to play {{champion:25}} with the new visual update. Here is a visual attachment.

replies.body: Never mind that, have you read twisted fate's counter strategy by riot?
